name: NightGlo Dog Teepee- Small Door
description:
This item is made to order.  Please allow two weeks from purchase date to ship.  

We created a cat teepee originally to house our neighborhood kitty during the cold nights, and she's since made it her new home.  We couldn't help passing this on to all the other little animals to enjoy!

The Nightglo, Dog Teepee is made especially for your lil' doggies to snuggle up in.  It's made out of a heavyweight canvas, and plenty spacious for your little furry to hang out in.  

The teepee comes with a 1" removable and hand washable bed, made of a soft, Blizzard Fleece material that your dog will love!  

Everything is handmade, screen printed and sewn at my studio. 

And did we tell you it glows in the dark?!!  This teepee will be "Glo, Glo, Glo-ing" instead of "Ho, Ho, Ho-ing" this holiday season!  After immediately being exposed to light, this teepee glows in the dark for a few minutes after.  Now there's no excuse to trip over your sleeping pet at night!

Also, for a limited time, you get a God's Eye/Postcard/Button pack included with your order!  Hang your God's Eye from your teepee ceiling, but make sure just out of reach of the batting paws!   

And, is that a subtle smell of cedar you smell?  That's right, I've made special cedar bags that will be sent with your order to ensure your teepee  arrives with a sweet scent of nature.  

Please see the image included for the precise dimensions.  

Intended for indoor use only.

Sorry, currently we only ship within the United States.

name: Vermilion Cat Teepee
description:
Made to order.  Please allow a two week window from purchase date to ship.  

I created a cat teepee originally to house our neighborhood kitty during the cold nights, and she's since made it her new home.  I couldn't help passing this on to all the other little animals to enjoy!

The Vermilion Cat Teepee is made especially for your kitties to snuggle up in.  It's made out of a heavyweight canvas, and plenty spacious for your little furry to both sleep in and sprawl out!

The teepee comes with a 1" removable and hand washable bed, made of a soft, Blizzard Fleece material that your cat will love!  

Everything is handmade, screen printed and sewn by me at my Seattle-based studio.

Also, for a limited time, you get a God's Eye/Postcard/Button pack included with your order!  Hang your God's Eye from your teepee ceiling, but make sure just out of reach of the batting paws!   

And, is that a subtle smell of cedar you smell?  That's right, I've made special cedar bags that will be sent with your order to ensure your teepee  arrives smelling like the sweet scent of nature.  

Please see the image included for the precise dimensions.  

Intended for indoor use only.

Pickles is modeling the dog version.  The design is slightly different, yet the sizing is exactly like the cat teepee.
